Methodologies: Quantitative measurement of exhaled nitric oxide
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Apieron INSIGHT™ eNO System for quantitative measurement of exhaled nitric oxide in expired human breath as an adjunct marker of inflammation in asthma.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitatively measures exhaled nitric oxide in expired human breath as a marker of inflammation in persons with asthma, used to evaluate response to anti-inflammatory therapy in children (8-17) and adults (18+), in a physician's office laboratory setting.
